EmailTemplate.name: 2020_EMEAI_HOC_MC.2020_EMEAI_Confirmation_HOC_MC
EmailTemplate.subject: [Registration Confirmed] 2020 HONEYWELL OPERATORS CONFERENCE EUROPE MIDDLE-EAST AFRICA & INDIA (EMEAI)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Thank you for registering for Honeywell Aerospace's upcoming event. We'd like to confirm that you have successfully registered for the following event:
Event: 2020 Honeywell Operators Conference Europe Middle-East Africa & India (EMEAI)
Date: March 3rd - 5th, 2020
Location: Details about location will be sent to you shortly.
We look forward to meeting you!
Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace Event Team
